caller_intent: Holly from Alliance Insurance is seeking assistance with reinstating a canceled property policy after a mortgage company sent a check, but the payment status is unclear.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed policy details (Cara Brown, policy number 6075863916571, zip code 27295).
Notified Holly about the reinstatement offer and payment deadline (November 23rd).
Provided check numbers (13599 and 136296) for verification.
Put Holly on hold to consult with an account specialist about the check status.
Requested Holly to confirm check numbers and listen to the call ahead for further verification.
knowledge_required: Handling customer inquiries about payment statuses
summary: Holly from Alliance Insurance contacted Travelers to resolve a policy reinstatement issue after a mortgage check was sent. The agent verified policy details, provided check numbers, and put Holly on hold to consult with a specialist about the payment status. The call is pending further action from the account specialist.
